messages.content: You can install ComfyUI-MagicAnimate via the ComfyUI-Manager (option 1) or manually through Git and pip (option 2).
What does the MagicAnimateModelLoader node do?
The MagicAnimateModelLoader node is used to load the MagicAnimate model.
What does the MagicAnimate node do?
The MagicAnimate node uses the MagicAnimate model to animate an input image using an input DeepPose video, and outputs the generated video.
How much storage will be required to download the model weights for ComfyUI-MagicAnimate?
During installation, the custom node will auto-download approximately 15GB of model weights.
Can you provide an example workflow that demonstrates how to animate any person's image using a DeepPose video input?
Yes, you can find an example workflow at [https://comfyworkflows.com/workflows/2e137168-91f7-414d-b3c6-23feaf704fdb] which includes a workflow graph and a sample output.
